name: Jeremiah Graves
coverLetter:
Ive Been trimming for 9 years on and off.. Indoor is my peference (faster work for my hand speed) deps too. Outdoor depending on how tight and nice you want it to look.. I pride my self in making the product look its best...actually tending to each Bud for each one is different.. So that takes time and skill.. Im not an slow trimmer by any means.. But i dont rush thru it.. That being said ive been handed jobs specifically for my ability to care for the project ..#EMERALDFAMILYFARMS #HUMBOLDTSTANDARD #CALIFORNIAKIND etc.. Follow me on INSTAGRAM for Examples of my work @lyirc_citea17. 

Jeremiah Graves.
